overview:
Internet pioneer in Brazil. Starting as a Journalist, turned web guru. Did all things web: editing, design, architecture, business.

On the founding team of ZAZ/Nutecnet. ZAZ was the second big portal to launch nationwide in Brazil, in 1995. Nutecnet was the first nationwide ISP. When ZAZ was sold to Telefonica (becoming Terra), was invited to deploy the Terra portal in the USA. Worked for Terra, Lycos, then set in Washington, DC as a Production Director for a subsidiary of NAVTEQ. Currently works for the joint venture music channel of MSN Americas (Canada + Spanish language portals), Cyloop.
